General.Name: KHVATEC Co.Ltd
General.Description: KHVATEC Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells ICT components and modules worldwide. The company offers precision parts, including aluminum, magnesium, zinc, copper, and stamping parts, as well as CNC machining parts; multiple motion hinge products and sliding modules; foldable hinges; mobile accessories; and flexible printed circuit boards, as well as value adding assembly for mechanism, and value adding sub-assembly products. It also provides bracket parts; and neckband type 360-degree camera. The company was formerly known as KEUMHO Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KHVATEC Co.,Ltd. in 2001. KHVATEC Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Gumi-si, South Korea.

1.Name: Ms. Jongsook  Kim
1.Title: Managing Director and Head of CSR Division
